mapper.select: select b.blog_id,b.title,b.create_date,b.update_date,b.synopsis,a.author_id,a.username,a.nickname FROM `dts_blog` b,`uts_author` a where a.author_id = b.author_id and b.state_code = 1001 order by b.create_date desc
select b.blog_id,title,create_date createDate,username,nickname,synopsis FROM `dts_blog` b,`uts_author` u where u.blog_id = b.author_id and b.blog_id = #{blogId}

select b.blog_id,title,create_date createDate,username,nickname,synopsis FROM `dts_blog` b,`uts_author` u where u.blog_id = b.author_id and b.state_code = 1001 and b.title LIKE concat("%"#{title},"%") order by create_date desc
select b.blog_id,b.title,b.create_date,b.synopsis,b.text,a.username,a.nickname,a.author_id from `dts_blog` b,`uts_author` a where b.author_id = a.author_id and b.blog_id = #{id}
select *, create_date createDate from `dts_blog` b, `uts_author` u where b.author_id = u.author_id and username = #{username} and state_code = 1001 order by b.create_date desc

select b.blog_id,b.title,b.create_date,b.synopsis,a.username,a.nickname from `dts_like_data` ld ,`uts_author` a,`dts_blog` b where a.author_id = ld.author_id and b.blog_id = ld.blog_id and a.username = #{username} order by ld.create_date desc
